title: Got blocked in Bullet Time.
body:
Died to it alone (2009 Damage) because Trundle Ice Pillared and the friendly MF pathed in front of me and angled to the right and I was trying to path to the left and when I tried to re-direct my path to the right to get out of the bullet time and avoid her block I died because she was basically perma-blocking me by running slightly to the left and I couldn't cut the short path towards the thinner area of the conical skillshot and had to try to repath and get out at the wide end of the Bullet Time and died before I could get out.

http://apollo-uploads-oce.s3.amazonaws.com/1433971419/cool-thanks-guy-thumb.jpg

replies.body:

> have you tried killing yourself?

Obviously.
And you couldn't even do that properly

> [{quoted}](name=Serfige,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ssKNEErE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-22T06:30:19.052+0000)
>
> And you couldn't even do that properly

Say it to my face.

Oh wait you can't because you're a keyboard warrior.
What are you going to do? Commit sudoku in front of me?
